ingredients: 3/4 cup plum jam or apricot preserves
instructions: Cut ribs into serving-size pieces; place with bone side down on a rack in a shallow roasting pan.
Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour or until ribs are tender; drain.
Combine remaining ingredients; brush some of the sauce over ribs.
Grill over medium heat, uncovered, for 30 minutes, brushing occasionally with sauce.
title: Ribs with Plum Sauce
steps: Cut ribs into serving-size pieces; place with bone side down on a rack in a shallow roasting pan.
